I20070501-0010

I've gotten this a few times on startup now:

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
at java.util.HashMap$HashIterator.nextEntry(HashMap.java:787)
at java.util.HashMap$KeyIterator.next(HashMap.java:823)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.contextlaunching.LaunchingResourceManager.computeLabels(LaunchingResourceManager.java:189)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.contextlaunching.LaunchingResourceManager$2.run(LaunchingResourceManager.java:119)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
We should use a ListenerList here to avoid this problem.

fixed in HEAD

changed the current HashSet implementation to be a ListenerList.

changes in LaunchingResourceManager
